Thanks for the upload! A/V are great!! The only problem is it's either REALLY zoomed in or REALLY cropped. Most of the time more than half of faces, etc are cut off. Basically it's the middle square of the screen. :-(

10/10 cause the dude had the balls to film that shit in the first place and upload it so we bitches could enjoy in this fucking creation. Appreciate what someone else does and show some respect. Thank you HeroMaster I enjoyed your upload as I would do if I had the real deal in HD.

Good quality, watchable. Why the Spanish picture though? It's in English.. but regardless I've seen comments saying "Man, you had balls to record at the movie theater" Sure it's great to record it at the movie theater but how about somebody go pay for Netflix and upload a DVDRip of it because I really hate looking at lesser quality torrents, but I am grateful you have went through the trouble of uploading this torrent.
